entities.name: Contact
entities.description: A Contact is associated with up to one Account, zero to many Notes and zero to many Documents. An Account typically has one contact though may have more.

fields.name: firstName
fields.label: First Name
fields.hint: Your first or given name

fields.name: lastName
fields.label: Last Name
fields.hint: Your last or family name

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.hint: Your title / salutation

fields.name: email
fields.label: Email Address
fields.hint: Your business email address

fields.name: phone1
fields.label: Preferred Phone Number
fields.hint: Your preferred telephone number

fields.name: phone2
fields.label: Other Phone Number
fields.hint: A backup telephone number

fields.name: address1
fields.label: Address
fields.hint: House or apartment name or number

fields.name: address2
fields.hint: Stree

fields.name: postCode
fields.label: Post Code
fields.hint: Postal code, example N1 9DH

fields.name: stage
fields.label: Stage
fields.hint: The point in the sales funnel of this lead

fields.name: enquiryType
fields.label: Enquiry Type
fields.hint: The nature of the enquiry, typically specific to the tenant's business

fields.name: accountType
fields.label: Account Type
fields.hint: Customer, Partner etc.

fields.name: owner
fields.label: Owner
fields.hint: The sales person for this account

fields.name: doNotCall
fields.label: Do Not Call
fields.hint: Is it ok to call this lead?

fields.name: doNotEmail
fields.label: Do Not Email
fields.hint: Is it ok to email this lead?

fields.name: source
fields.label: Source
fields.hint: Where this lead came from, typically auto-populated by pay-per-click system

fields.name: medium
fields.label: Medium
fields.hint: Medium this lead came via, typically auto-populated by pay-per-click system

fields.name: campaign
fields.label: Campaign
fields.hint: Additional information from the pay-per-click system

fields.name: keyword
fields.label: Keyword
fields.hint: Additional information from the pay-per-click system

fields.name: timeSinceEmail
fields.label: Time since email
fields.hint: Time since our last email to contact (milliseconds)

fields.name: timeSinceLogin
fields.label: Time since login
fields.hint: Time since last login (milliseconds)

fields.name: timeSinceRegistered
fields.label: Time since registered
fields.hint: Time since last registered (milliseconds)

fields.name: tenantId
fields.label: Tenant
fields.hint: Name of the the Omny account

fields.name: firstContact
fields.label: First Contact
fields.hint: Date of first contact with this business

fields.name: lastUpdated
fields.label: Last Updated
fields.hint: Date of last update to this account

fields.name: shareOfBusiness
fields.label: Share of Business (%)
fields.hint: Your share in the business.

entities.name: Email
entities.description: An email is an action (conclusion) available to the decision table authors.

fields.name: subject
fields.label: Subject Line
fields.hint: Subject line for the email

fields.name: template
fields.label: Template Name
fields.hint: Name of email template to use
